imdb.plot outline: Realizing that the least common denominator in all her failed relationships is herself (with the help of her lifetime best friend), our self-effacing heroine wallows in the regret of the first mistake that started it all at 15 years old. Her night takes an unexpected turn though when the vanity she's had since she was 15 suddenly becomes a portal to her former self. Will she take the opportunity to advise herself? What would you do? (FREQUENCY meets the frank honesty and romantic nature of HE'S JUST NOT THAT INTO YOU)
imdb.title: Radio Luminosity
plot: If your mirror became a portal to your 15-year-old self, what would you do with it? Assuming you have the guts to alter the very fabric of space-time - I mean, what could happen?::Casara Clark
